name: White Diesel
description: White Diesel is a sativa-dominant hybrid that mixes the resinous White Widow with the pungent flavors of NYC Diesel. The buds from White Diesel produce a zesty combination of lemon, grapefruit, and the diesel fumes that we’ve come to expect from Sour Diesel varieties. The effects are a well-rounded mix of an uplifting sativa head buzz with mellow body relaxation. Medical patients enjoy White Diesel’s ability to ward off anxiety and depression, and for combatting migraines and gastrointestinal disorders.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Focused, Stress, Pain, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
